Sharia Law in the US: The implementation of Sharia law as a legal system in the U.S. has been a topic in political discourse, primarily driven by concerns from some conservative pundits and politicians. However, these concerns focus on the perceived threat of its adoption rather than any actual widespread movement to replace U.S. law with Sharia. The U.S. legal system is based on the U.S. Constitution, which establishes a secular government and the separation of church and state, making the implementation of a religious legal system like Sharia unfeasible and unconstitutional. this IS why they want our constitution GONE permalink parent award report block reply SorosHasBallsackEyes 1 points 5 days ago The only way to find out may be via post-mortems permalink parent award report block reply Psarg 0 points 5 days ago Somalia has clans, which are groupings based on ancestry, not tribes, which are based on territory. permalink parent award report block reply henri_derelicte 38 points 5 days ago Import the third world, become the third world. permalink award report block reply Bullet_Tooth_Tony 8 points 5 days ago Americans have clans on SOCOM and Call of Duty. A riot broke out as two rival refugee tribes faced each other and open combat. permalink parent award report block reply MediaBro 4 points 5 days ago Anyone who knows about refugee camps is well aware that amongst Muslim refugees, the Syrian refugees, at first, were some of the best but the worst were the Afghans. The Afghans, pretty much all men, were so bad the Syrians had to keep their women, in particular, away from them and their children. These men would otherwise straight up target the Syrians and pretty much anyone in the camps. There is a YouTuber called Lubna, who is a Pakistani-Brit and she has literally spoken to a Pakistani woman living in one of these refugee camps in Germany, filled to the brim with Afghan and Pakistani men and they're all moaning about when they get to participate in their jihad and begin their wars. They know what they're there for. permalink parent award report block reply BlokeyMcBlokeFace 3 points 5 days ago In the case of Eritreans, it's been happening in Germany for a few years already... Police in the southwestern German city of Stuttgart on Sunday said dozens of people, including at least 26 officers were injured amid unrest surrounding an Eritrean cultural festival. Along with 26 officers, four people participating in the event and two protesting it were injured, police said in a statement. Six of the injured officers were being treated at the hospital. The clash was the latest in a string of incidents at such events in Germany and elsewhere, with fights breaking out between Eritrean government supporters and opponents. Police said they took 228 people into custody with police citing "massive violence" between the two groups. https://www.dw.com/en/germany-dozens-injured-in-unrest-at-eritrean-event/a-66837449 permalink parent award report block reply anotherthing 1 points 5 days ago Soon, I hope. permalink parent award report block reply ebuy123 10 points 5 days ago thanks obama permalink award report block reply notatallimsure 10 points 5 days ago Great, I'm super glad this dumb ass african tribal bullshit is happening in OUR COUNTRY. permalink award report block reply CleanUpPhillyTrump24 9 points 5 days ago Now I know how to spell these two names: Hawiye and Daarood. This will get even worse, by the way. The Hindu v Muslim v Sikh wars are coming to your local neighborhood very soon. Your country will become a blend of South African, Indian and Pakistani politics. I genuinely do see Civil Wars within 5 to 6 yrs and I said, Civil Wars, not Civil War because it's going to be Balkanized wars happening between multiple different communities pitching themselves against each other. A different kind of horror is then having multiple countries across the planet try and either fund their community's side or worse, send in troops to allow their side to win or bring back the balance and keep the truce. Whatever happens, it's not going to go well for the US or the world in the next coming decade. permalink award report block reply NewBurner04 3 points 5 days ago Nig no like Nog! permalink award report block reply KeepingAmericaGreat 3 points 5 days ago Oh, brother! permalink award report block reply Weneverleft 3 points 5 days ago X, Balkanization is the process by which a country or region breaks apart into smaller, often unfriendly political units, typically along ethnic, cultural, or religious lines. The term originated from the fragmentation of the Balkan Peninsula in the early 20th century following the breakup of empires like the Ottoman Empire. This fragmentation can result in ethnic conflict and political instability within the newly divided areas. permalink award report block reply Weneverleft 2 points 5 days ago All by design,  Destroy America from within. We have huge cancerous tumors metastasising in our country. The Somalians control Minnesota district 5 because that's where they all are. And by controlling that one district, now the entire state is blue. Seriously, look at the electoral maps. The rest of Minnesota is either red or leans red. But district 5 is big enough (it's the core of the twin cities) to move the entire state solidly blue. thats why there is so much fraud and it's tolerated: Somalians give Minnesota to the Democrats. Without them, Minnesota goes Republican. permalink award report block reply booblitchutz 3 points 5 days ago Good to know there is at least ONE functional division on the left that can result in electoral losses.
